mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 882) for an order placed by Shelly Sneider for 4 orders of 125 two color window cards for a performance by Ernest Tubb, Lefty Frizzell, Mel Tillis, and Ruby Wright at the Ocala Municipal Auditorium in Ocala, Florida on January 20, the National Guard Armory in Belle Glade, Florida on January 21, the Peabody Auditorium in Daytona Beach, Florida on January 22, and the Municipal Auditorium in Orlando, Florida on January 23. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
